message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a competitive price, considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $8000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $10000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value the product brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, given my financial situation, I am still unable to meet at $10000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and allows us to move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product brings to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price.
